ygData.messageBody:
>From: <kim@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] PoA bard quests plus a rant
>Date: Fri, 28 Jan 2000 12:30:41 -0500 (EST)
>
>On Fri, 28 Jan 2000, Rokenn Swiftsong wrote:
> >
> > If the comparison is a straight up duel between a warrior and a necro
>then
> > the obvious way to kill the pet is to kill the master :) If the warrior
>is
> > dumb enough to sit there and melee the pet he deserves to lose.
>
>Most folks already agree that in a straight contest of melee
>vs caster, caster will usually win. Adding a pet to the
>caster side of that equation just results in the caster
>usually winning more often. (Mages would probably be the
>exception since they don't have any root/snare type spells.)
>
>--
>John H. Kim
>kim@...
>

Two words: Pumice Stone :)
